title: Strengthening Practical Competencies in Management Strategy: Simulation-Based Expert Training for Diabetic Ketoacidosis (DKA) Management

context.prior_knowledge: Requirement of intermediate theoretical background and practical experience
context.additional_context: Practical competency enhancement program for corporate management/HR/administrative staff

learning_goals: Through a diabetic ketoacidosis (DKA) patient simulation, learners perform blood glucose and electrolyte balance recovery procedures with 90% accuracy within 2 hours.
By monitoring real-time virtual patient data, learners select appropriate treatment protocols in over 80% of cases.
In team-based scenarios, learners can verbally and/or written explain the DKA management decision-making process with over 70% clarity.
difficulty: Moderate - Standard complexity with some constraints
